content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am not interested in negotiating the price. I am greedy and always try to get the highest possible price. I will try everything in my power to increase the price. Let's start the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking to maximize the rental price, and I appreciate your straightforwardness. Could you please provide me with your initial offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a greedy landlord, I will not provide an initial offer. I want you to make the first offer, and I will try to negotiate it up. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, I am willing to pay 500 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I decline your offer of 500 Euro. As a greedy landlord, I am not satisfied with that amount. I will try to negotiate it up. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I'm here to find a fair agreement. I am willing to increase my offer to 550 Euro per month. Is this more acceptable to you?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I decline your offer of 550 Euro. As a greedy landlord, I am still not satisfied with that amount. I will try to negotiate it up. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm committed to reaching a fair deal. I'm willing to increase my offer further to 600 Euro per month. This reflects the prime location and the quality of the apartment. Is this closer to your expectations?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I decline your offer of 600 Euro. As a greedy landlord, I am still not satisfied with that amount. I will try to negotiate it up. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding that you are seeking a higher price, I am willing to go up to 650 Euro per month. This is a generous offer, considering the current market and the apartment's condition. Would you be willing to accept this?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I accept your offer of 650 Euro. As a greedy landlord, I am satisfied with this amount. 'I agree to the price of 650 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fantastic! It's a pleasure doing business with you, Emilia. I'm sure you'll enjoy the apartment. 'TERMINATE'
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
